page.title: 12TRANSPORT TRAFFIC ROADS CARS
page.content:
The M2 motorway crosses the south west corner of the grid. There is a heavy traffic flow especially during week days when the road is used by a great many commercial vehicles. These come from all over the country and Europe.
During the summer the road is very busy with cars taking tourists to the Kent ports and holiday resorts. The road carries over 4 000 vehicles an hour in both directions during the day. The only other important road is the B2163 which links Sittingbourne and Hollingbourne. This old road,narrow and especially dangerous during the winter, has many blind corners. The other roads are twisting country lanes,having high hedgerows and carrying only a handful of local traffic.
